City Council
============

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://missouricitytx.civicweb.net/Portal/MeetingTypeList.aspx)

-------

Functions & Board Authority
---------------------------

The mayor and City Council for Missouri City are responsible for policy functions under provisions of the [Home Rule Charter](https://library.municode.com/tx/missouri_city/codes/code_of_ordinances?nodeId=PTICH) of the City of Missouri City, which was adopted in 1974. The mayor, two council members, and four district council members are elected every three years. The mayor is entitled to vote on all issues and has no power to veto City Council action.

Further information about the City's elections, upcoming general elections, frequently asked questions and previous elections may be accessed on this [Elections Webpage](https://www.missouricitytx.gov/558/ElectionEleccin).

The General Election for members of City Council will be held the first Tuesday following the first Monday in November. During the October 17, 2016, regular City Council meeting, council members voted 4 to 3 to approve a resolution that moved the City's general elections from May to November.
